name: 劉宣良
objective:
1.The definition of biotechnology.
2.The overview of the impact of biotechnology on society.
3.Specific milestones in the development and application of biotechnology.
4.The levels of eukaryotic organization.
5.The structural organization of living things at the cellular level.
6.The structure and properties of key cellular macromolecules (DNA, RNA, and proteins).
7.The roles of cellular structures and biomolecules in biotechnology.
schedule:
wk 1: Chap. 1 What Is Biotechnology
wk 2: Chap. 2 The Nature of Living Things: How They Are Organized
wk 3: Chap. 3 The Nature of Living Things: How They Function
wk 4: Chap. 4 Nature of Living Things: Genetic Behavior
wk 5: Chap. 5 Principles of Genetic Manipulation of Organisms: Conventional Approach
wk 6: Chap. 6 Principles of Genetic Manipulation of Organisms: Recombinant DNA (rDNA) Technology
wk 7: Chap. 7 Cell and Tissue Culture
wk 8: Chap. 8 Electrophoresis and Blotting
wk 9: Mid-term exam
wk 10: Chap. 9 Molecular Markers
wk 11: Chap.10 The Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) and DNA Synthesis
wk 12: Chap. 11 Genome Mapping and DNA Sequencing
wk 13: Chap. 12 Storage and Retrieval of Genetic Information
wk 14: Chap. 13 Structural Genomics
wk 15: Chap. 14 Functional Genomics
wk 16: Chap. 15 Modifying Protein Production and Function
wk 17: Review
wk 18: Final exam
materials:
書名  UNDERSTANDING BIOTECHNOLOGY     
AN INTEGRATED AND CYBER-BASED APPROACH

作者  George Acquaah

出版商  PEARSON PRENTICE HALL

ISBN 0-13-094500-5
